markdownRemark.html: Situated in the Cordoba bus station, The Plaza de Armas has been renovated a while ago, and is now a pleasant shopping centre with cinemas, restaurants, cafes, shops, and also house the NH Hotel Plaza de Armas.

frontmatter.title: Plaza de Armas
